Tool: Trinotate, Trapid (PLAZA 2.5 DB), Mercator (all DBs except IPS; genome annotator but used here)
Blast2GO (Blastx + InterProScan) + KAAS server for KEGG
Other: WEGO online tool for plotting GO terms
MISA + CPC for predicting lncRNA + FunctionAnnotation webserver used in addition to Trinotate

Databases: NR, NT, Pfam, KEGG, KOG, SP
Other: MISA + iTAK (plant transcription factor pred) + CNCIv2, Pfam-scan, CPCvcpc-0.9-r2, PLEKv1.2 together for lncRNA prediction via elimination of everything detected by these tools

Databases: Refseq_complete, UniProt, TAIR10 A. thaliana proteome, EggNOG DB
Pfam, Rfam, OrthoDB, UniRef90, InterProScan Dbs, NR
Other: BWA and a custom mitochondrial genome for detecting mitochondrial genes

Tool: Dammit! + Sma3S (for functional annotation) + WebMGA (for KOG)
Databases: Pfam, Rfam, UniRef90, OrthoDB, KOG, KEGG (via KAAS)
